key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities, particularly in sourcing chassis and electronic components
Economic sensitivity due to the cyclical nature of the RV industry and potential recessions
Environmental impact from manufacturing large vehicles and emissions
Labor challenges including shortages and rising wage pressures
controversies: Potential adverse outcomes from current or future litigation or regulatory investigations
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over emissions and waste from production processes
Pressure to align with broader environmental trends despite ongoing sustainability efforts
social_issues: Labor shortages and rising wage pressures impacting production efficiency
governance_issues: Commitment to ethical business practices and human rights, including prohibition of child labor
